title: Steel Cut Oats in the Slow Cooker
directions: Combine water, oats and salt in a 4-6 quart slow cooker. Cover with lid and cook on low for 7-8 hours or overnight. Makes 4 servings.Variations:Add dried fruit, cinnamon and nuts along with oats. Use milk or cream in place of part or all of the water.
ingredients: 1 cup Steel Cut Oat sor Organic Steel Cut Oats
